system.effect: The hit causes the target's sight to blur and his head to spin. The target suffers a -10 penalty to Perception and Intelligence tests for [[1d5]] rounds.

description.value:
Impact Damage to Head (Severity 2)

The hit causes the target's sight to blur and his head to spin. The target suffers a -10 penalty to Perception and Intelligence tests for [[1d5]] rounds.
